title: Lucecita
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019011659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lucecitaManiac_4254.jpg)
  
Hello typophiles, Cocijotype has released Lucecita, a led screen based typeface with 3 styles, Regular (Healthy), with kernings; Maniac Foreground and Maniac Background, both of them with no kernings. It's available at [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019011659/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/cocijotype/lucecita/). Have fun!
author: Eli

comments.content:
Hi Elí,

I'm really enjoying your submissions, since I'm an optical illusion stuff fan.  
 Just to say, keep up the good work, and that I'm working on a font, for personal use, just for easy pattern making, but with letters too. I just started and I'll show when I think it's ready to show it off.

Regards  
 João

Thank you very much João, looking forward to see your work.  
Kind regards!
